article.title: Rockwell Collins to Provide Air Force with Defense Advanced GPS Receivers
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Rockwell Collins Incorporated Government Systems is modifying a U.S. Air Force contract modification for $67.5 million. This modification exercises production options for the purchase of 29,587 defense advanced global positioning system receivers (DAGRs) and accessories. Global Positioning Systems Wing/PK, El Segundo, California, is the contracting activity.
